verses.verse: דִּ֭בְרֵי <WH1697> Div-rei The words לְמוּאֵ֣ל <WH3927> le-mu-'El Lemuel מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech; of king מַ֝שָּׂ֗א <WH4853> mas-Sa, the prophecy אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'asher- which יִסְּרַ֥תּוּ <WH3256> yis-se-Rat-tu taught אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> im-Mo. that his mother

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What בְּ֭רִי <WH1248> Be-ri son וּמַֽה־ <WH4100> u-mah- What בַּר־ <WH1248> bar- son בִּטְנִ֑י <WH990> bit-Ni; belly וּ֝מֶה <WH4100> U-meh What בַּר־ <WH1248> bar- son נְדָרָֽי׃ <WH5088> ne-da-Rai. vow

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> tit-Ten Give לַנָּשִׁ֣ים <WH802> lan-na-Shim unto women חֵילֶ֑ךָ <WH2428> chei-Le-cha; not thy strength וּ֝דְרָכֶ֗יךָ <WH1870> u-de-ra-Chei-cha, nor thy ways לַֽמְח֥וֹת <WH4229> lam-Chot to that which destroyeth מְלָכִֽין׃ <WH4428> me-la-Chin. kings

אַ֤ל <WH408> 'al for לַֽמְלָכִ֨ים׀ <WH4428> lam-la-Chim [It is] not for kings לְֽמוֹאֵ֗ל <WH3927> le-mo-'El, O Lemuel אַ֣ל <WH408> 'al for לַֽמְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> lam-la-Chim [it is] not for kings שְׁתוֹ־ <WH8354> she-tov- to drink יָ֑יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin; wine וּ֝לְרוֹזְנִ֗ים <WH7336> u-le-roz-Nim, princes; אֹו 'ov כאֵ֣י <WH176> 'Ei and קשֵׁכָֽר׃ <WH7941> she-Char. strong drink

פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- lest יִ֭שְׁתֶּה <WH8354> Yish-teh Lest they drink וְיִשְׁכַּ֣ח <WH7911> ve-yish-Kach and forget מְחֻקָּ֑ק <WH2710> me-chuk-Kak; the law וִֽ֝ישַׁנֶּה <WH8138> Vi-shan-neh and pervert דִּ֣ין <WH1779> din the judgment כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- afflicted עֹֽנִי׃ <WH6040> 'O-ni. misery

תְּנוּ־ <WH5414> te-nu- Give שֵׁכָ֣ר <WH7941> she-Char strong drink לְאוֹבֵ֑ד <WH6> le-'o-Ved; unto him that is ready to perish וְ֝יַיִן <WH3196> Ve-ya-yin and wine לְמָ֣רֵי <WH4751> le-Ma-rei unto those that be of heavy נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> Na-fesh. hearts

יִ֭שְׁתֶּה <WH8354> Yish-teh Let him drink וְיִשְׁכַּ֣ח <WH7911> ve-yish-Kach and forget רִישׁ֑וֹ <WH7389> ri-Sho; his poverty וַ֝עֲמָל֗וֹ <WH5999> va-'a-ma-Lo, his misery לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo no יִזְכָּר־ <WH2142> yiz-kor- and remember עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> od. more

פְּתַח־ <WH6605> pe-tach- Open פִּ֥יךָ <WH6310> Pi-cha thy mouth לְאִלֵּ֑ם <WH483> le-'il-Lem; for the dumb אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- for דִּ֝֗ין <WH1779> Din, in the cause כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of all such as are appointed חֲלֽוֹף׃ <WH2475> cha-Lof. to destruction

פְּתַח־ <WH6605> pe-tach- Open פִּ֥יךָ <WH6310> Pi-cha thy mouth שְׁפָט־ <WH8199> she-fot- judge צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek; righteously וְ֝דִ֗ין <WH1777> ve-Din, and plead עָנִ֥י <WH6041> 'a-Ni the cause of the poor וְאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <WH34> ve-'ev-Yon. and needy פ Peh

אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> 'e-shet- wife חַ֭יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil a virtuous מִ֣י <WH4310> mi who יִמְצָ֑א <WH4672> yim-Tza; Who can find וְרָחֹ֖ק <WH7350> ve-ra-Chok [is] far מִפְּנִינִ֣ים <WH6443> mip-pe-ni-Nim above rubies מִכְרָֽהּ׃ <WH4377> mich-Rah. pay

בָּ֣טַח <WH982> Ba-tach doth safely trust בָּ֭הּ bah לֵ֣ב <WH3820> lev The heart בַּעְלָ֑הּ <WH1167> ba'-Lah; of her husband וְ֝שָׁלָ֗ל <WH7998> ve-sha-Lal, of spoil לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo no יֶחְסָֽר׃ <WH2637> yech-Sar. in her so that he shall have no need

גְּמָלַ֣תְהוּ <WH1580> ge-ma-Lat-hu She will do ט֣וֹב <WH2896> Tov him good וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and not רָ֑ע <WH7451> Ra'; and not evil כֹּ֝֗ל <WH3605> Kol, All יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> ye-Mei all the days חַיֶּֽיה׃ <WH2416> chai-Yeih of her life

דָּ֭רְשָׁה <WH1875> Da-re-shah She seeketh צֶ֣מֶר <WH6785> Tze-mer wool וּפִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6593> u-fish-Tim; and flax וַ֝תַּ֗עַשׂ <WH6213> vat-Ta-'as, and worketh בְּחֵ֣פֶץ <WH2656> be-Che-fetz willingly כַּפֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH3709> kap-Pei-ha. with her hands

הָ֭יְתָה <WH1961> Ha-ye-tah become כָּאֳנִיּ֣וֹת <WH591> ko-'o-ni-Yot ships סוֹחֵ֑ר <WH5503> so-Cher; She is like the merchants' מִ֝מֶּרְחָ֗ק <WH4801> mi-mer-Chak, from afar תָּבִ֥יא <WH935> ta-Vi she bringeth לַחְמָֽהּ׃ <WH3899> lach-Mah. her food

וַתָּ֤קָם׀ <WH6965> vat-Ta-kom She riseth בְּע֬וֹד <WH5750> be-'od is still לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> Lay-lah, also while it is yet night וַתִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> vat-tit-Ten and giveth טֶ֣רֶף <WH2964> Te-ref meat לְבֵיתָ֑הּ <WH1004> le-vei-Tah; to her household וְ֝חֹ֗ק <WH2706> ve-Chok, and a portion לְנַעֲרֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5291> le-na-'a-ro-Tei-ha. to her maidens

זָמְמָ֣ה <WH2161> za-me-Mah She considereth שָׂ֭דֶה <WH7704> deh a field וַתִּקָּחֵ֑הוּ <WH3947> vat-tik-ka-Che-hu; and buyeth מִפְּרִ֥י <WH6529> mip-pe-Ri it with the fruit כַ֝פֶּ֗יהָ <WH3709> chap-Pei-ha, of her hands; נְטַע ne-ta' כנָ֣טְעָה <WH5193> Na-te-'ah fastened קכָּֽרֶם׃ <WH3754> Ka-rem. a vineyard

חָֽגְרָ֣ה <WH2296> cha-ge-Rah She girdeth בְע֣וֹז <WH5797> ve-'oz with strength מָתְנֶ֑יהָ <WH4975> ma-te-Nei-ha; her loins וַ֝תְּאַמֵּ֗ץ <WH553> vat-te-'am-Metz, and strengtheneth זְרֹעוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH2220> ze-ro-'o-Tei-ha. her arms

טָ֭עֲמָה <WH2938> Ta-'a-mah She perceiveth כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ט֣וֹב <WH2896> Tov [is] good סַחְרָ֑הּ <WH5504> sach-Rah; that her merchandise לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- does not יִכְבֶּ֖ה <WH3518> yich-Beh goeth not out; בַלַּיִל val-la-yil כבַלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> val-Lay-lah night קנֵרָֽהּ׃ <WH5216> ne-Rah. her candle

יָ֭דֶיהָ <WH3027> Ya-dei-ha her hands שִׁלְּחָ֣ה <WH7971> shil-le-Chah She layeth בַכִּישׁ֑וֹר <WH3601> vak-ki-Shor; to the spindle וְ֝כַפֶּ֗יהָ <WH3709> ve-chap-Pei-ha, and her hands תָּ֣מְכוּ <WH8551> Ta-me-chu hold פָֽלֶךְ׃ <WH6418> Fa-lech. the distaff

כַּ֭פָּהּ <WH3709> Kap-pah her hand פָּרְשָׂ֣ה <WH6566> pa-re-Sah She stretcheth out לֶעָנִ֑י <WH6041> le-'a-Ni; to the poor וְ֝יָדֶ֗יהָ <WH3027> ve-ya-Dei-ha, her hands שִׁלְּחָ֥ה <WH7971> shil-le-Chah yea she reacheth forth לָֽאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <WH34> La-'ev-Yon. to the needy

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- is not תִירָ֣א <WH3372> ti-Ra She is not afraid לְבֵיתָ֣הּ <WH1004> le-vei-Tah for her household מִשָּׁ֑לֶג <WH7950> mish-Sha-leg; of the snow כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for כָל־ <WH3605> chol for all בֵּ֝יתָ֗הּ <WH1004> bei-Tah, for all her household לָבֻ֥שׁ <WH3847> la-Vush [are] clothed שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8144> sha-Nim. with scarlet

מַרְבַדִּ֥ים <WH4765> mar-vad-Dim herself coverings of tapestry עָֽשְׂתָה־ <WH6213> 'a-se-tah- She maketh לָּ֑הּ Lah; שֵׁ֖שׁ <WH8336> shesh [is] silk וְאַרְגָּמָ֣ן <WH713> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple לְבוּשָֽׁהּ׃ <WH3830> le-vu-Shah. her clothing

נוֹדָ֣ע <WH3045> no-Da' is known בַּשְּׁעָרִ֣ים <WH8179> bash-she-'a-Rim in the gates בַּעְלָ֑הּ <WH1167> ba'-Lah; Her husband בְּ֝שִׁבְתּ֗וֹ <WH3427> be-shiv-To, when he sitteth עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- among זִקְנֵי־ <WH2205> zik-nei- among the elders אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. of the land

סָדִ֣ין <WH5466> sa-Din fine linen עָ֭שְׂתָה <WH6213> 'A-se-tah She maketh וַתִּמְכֹּ֑ר <WH4376> vat-tim-Kor; and selleth וַ֝חֲג֗וֹר <WH2289> va-cha-Gor, girdles נָתְנָ֥ה <WH5414> na-te-Nah [it] and delivereth לַֽכְּנַעֲנִֽי׃ <WH3669> Lak-ke-na-'a-Ni. unto the merchant

עֹז־ <WH5797> 'oz- Strength וְהָדָ֥ר <WH1926> ve-ha-Dar and honour לְבוּשָׁ֑הּ <WH3830> le-vu-Shah; [are] her clothing וַ֝תִּשְׂחַ֗ק <WH7832> vat-tis-Chak, and she shall rejoice לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> le-Yom in time אַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <WH314> a-cha-Ron. to come

פִּ֭יהָ <WH6310> Pi-ha her mouth פָּתְחָ֣ה <WH6605> pa-te-Chah She openeth בְחָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> ve-cha-che-Mah; with wisdom וְתֽוֹרַת־ <WH8451> ve-to-rat- [is] the law חֶ֝֗סֶד <WH2617> Che-sed, of kindness עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on לְשׁוֹנָֽהּ׃ <WH3956> le-sho-Nah. and in her tongue

צ֭וֹפִיָּה <WH6822> Tzo-fi-yah She looketh well הֲלִיכ֣וֹת <WH1979> ha-li-Chot to the ways בֵּיתָ֑הּ <WH1004> bei-Tah; of her household וְלֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> ve-Le-chem not the bread עַ֝צְל֗וּת <WH6104> 'atz-Lut, of idleness לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo and does not תֹאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> to-Chel. and eateth

קָ֣מוּ <WH6965> Ka-mu arise up בָ֭נֶיהָ <WH1121> Va-nei-ha Her children וַֽיְאַשְּׁר֑וּהָ <WH833> vay-'ash-she-Ru-ha; and call her blessed בַּ֝עְלָ֗הּ <WH1167> ba'-Lah, her husband וַֽיְהַֽלְלָֽהּ׃ <WH1984> Vay-Hal-Lah. [also] and he praiseth

רַבּ֣וֹת <WH7227> rab-Bot Many בָּ֭נוֹת <WH1323> Ba-not daughters עָ֣שׂוּ <WH6213> 'A-su have done חָ֑יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil; virtuously וְ֝אַ֗תְּ <WH859> ve-'At, you עָלִ֥ית <WH5927> 'a-Lit but thou excellest עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֻּלָּֽנָה׃ <WH3605> kul-La-nah. all

שֶׁ֣קֶר <WH8267> She-ker [is] deceitful הַ֭חֵן <WH2580> Ha-chen Favour וְהֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> ve-He-vel [is] vain הַיֹּ֑פִי <WH3308> hai-Yo-fi; and beauty אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah [but] a woman יִרְאַת־ <WH3373> yir-'at- [that] feareth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God הִ֣יא <WH1931> hi she תִתְהַלָּֽל׃ <WH1984> tit-hal-Lal. she shall be praised

תְּנוּ־ <WH5414> te-nu- Give לָ֭הּ lah מִפְּרִ֣י <WH6529> mip-pe-Ri her of the fruit יָדֶ֑יהָ <WH3027> ya-Dei-ha; of her hands וִֽיהַלְל֖וּהָ <WH1984> vi-hal-Lu-ha praise בַשְּׁעָרִ֣ים <WH8179> vash-she-'a-Rim her in the gates מַעֲשֶֽׂיהָ׃ <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei-ha. and let her own works
